an4.257:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.257:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an4.257:5.1: “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
an4.257:5.2: “Ettha idāni, mālukyaputta, kiṃ dahare bhikkhū vakkhāma;
an4.257:5.3: yatra hi nāma tvaṃ jiṇṇo vuddho mahallako tathāgatassa saṃkhittena ovādaṃ yācasī”ti.
an4.257:5.6: Appeva nāmāhaṃ bhagavato bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājāneyyaṃ;
an4.257:5.7: appeva nāmāhaṃ bhagavato bhāsitassa dāyādo assan”ti.
an4.257:6.1: “Cattārome, mālukyaputta, taṇhuppādā yattha bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati.
an4.257:6.3: Cīvarahetu vā, mālukyaputta, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati.
an4.257:6.4: Piṇḍapātahetu vā, mālukyaputta, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati.
an4.257:6.5: Senāsanahetu vā, mālukyaputta, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati.
an4.257:6.6: Itibhavābhavahetu vā, mālukyaputta, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati.
an4.257:6.7: Ime kho, mālukyaputta, cattāro taṇhuppādā yattha bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati.
an4.257:6.8: Yato kho, mālukyaputta, bhikkhuno taṇhā pahīnā hoti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā, ayaṃ vuccati, mālukyaputta, ‘bhikkhu acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā’”ti.
an4.257:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavatā iminā ovādena ovadito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
an4.257:7.2: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
an4.257:7.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an4.257:7.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an4.257:7.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an4.257:7.6: Aññataro ca panāyasmā mālukyaputto arahataṃ ahosīti.
